headers.subject: [tosdr:2143] How to deal with incomplete ToS?

html:
If the ToS and privacy policy fail to mention a topic (e.g. what happens in case of a business transfer), should that be noted? How?

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
